com.bit6.sdk

Class Bit6

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bit6.sdk.Bit6

  • public class Bit6
extends java.lang.Object
    Bit6 is for interaction between the Bit6 framework and application

        Configures Bit6 instance, setting all required fields.

        context - Application context
        apikey - Bit6 API key

      • init

        public void init(android.content.Context context,
        java.lang.String apikey,
        int environment)
        Configures Bit6 instance, setting all required fields.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context
        apikey - Bit6 API key
        environment - production or development

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Destroys Bit6 instance, nullifies all members and destroys all connections. Calling init() is required for using Bit6 instance next time.

      • getSessionClient

        public void joinGroup(java.lang.String groupId,
             ResultHandler cb)
        Joins to a group
        Parameters:
        groupId -
        cb - Callback object with onResponse(boolean success, String msg) method. The method is called on UI thread.
